words.source: H8317 conj. + Qal perf. 3ms of שָׁרַץ 'to swarm, teem'; KJV 'and the river shall bring forth', ESV 'the Nile shall swarm', NASB 'the Nile will swarm'
H2975 art. + n.ms יְאֹר 'Nile, river'; KJV 'the river', ESV 'the Nile', NASB 'the Nile'
H6854 n.fp צְפַרְדֵּעַ 'frog'; KJV 'frogs abundantly', ESV 'with frogs', NASB 'with frogs'
H5927 conj. + Qal perf. 3cp of עָלָה 'to go up'; KJV 'which shall go up and come', ESV 'which shall come up', NASB 'which will come up'
H935 conj. + Qal perf. 3cp of בּוֹא 'to come, go'; KJV 'and come into', ESV 'and come into', NASB 'and come into'
H1004 prep. b- + n.ms constr. + 2ms suff. בַּיִת 'house'; KJV 'into thine house', ESV 'your house', NASB 'your house'
H2315 conj. + prep. b- + n.ms constr. חֶדֶר 'room, chamber'; KJV 'and into thy bedchamber', ESV 'and into your bedroom', NASB 'and into your bedroom'
H4904 n.ms constr. + 2ms suff. מִשְׁכָּב 'bed, couch'; KJV 'thy bedchamber', ESV 'your bedroom', NASB 'your bedroom'
H5921 conj. + prep. עַל 'and upon'; KJV 'and upon', ESV 'and on', NASB 'and on'
H4296 n.fs constr. + 2ms suff. מִטָּה 'bed, couch'; KJV 'thy bed', ESV 'your bed', NASB 'your bed'
H1004 conj. + prep. b- + n.ms constr. בַּיִת 'house'; KJV 'and into the house of', ESV 'and into the houses of', NASB 'and into the houses of'
H5650 n.mp constr. + 2ms suff. עֶבֶד 'servant'; KJV 'thy servants', ESV 'your servants', NASB 'your servants'
H5971 conj. + prep. b- + n.ms constr. + 2ms suff. עַם 'people'; KJV 'and upon thy people', ESV 'and among your people', NASB 'and on your people'
H8574 conj. + prep. b- + n.mp constr. + 2ms suff. תַּנּוּר 'oven'; KJV 'and into thine ovens', ESV 'and into your ovens', NASB 'and into your ovens'
H4863 conj. + prep. b- + n.fp constr. + 2ms suff. מִשְׁאֶרֶת 'kneading trough'; KJV 'and into thy kneadingtroughs', ESV 'and your kneading bowls', NASB 'and into your kneading bowls'
